thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Banks Still Waiting for Tax-Overhaul Borrowing Boost

author: Aaron Back
title: Banks Still Waiting for Tax-Overhaul Borrowing Boost
text:
Major U.S. banks saw a solid first quarter, but for their shares to keep moving higher, they need economic optimism to translate into real loan growth.
JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup both beat analyst estimates for first quarter earnings on Friday, aided by lower taxes, higher interest rates and strong equity trading. JPMorgan’s net profit rose 35% from a year earlier, while Citigroup’s rose 13%.
Equities...
